text: (Va cunon ki dar in Qur'on ʙajon kardem, ʙaroi musrikon) nisonaho va huccathoi xudro dar amri tavhid va nuʙuvvat va ham cunin nisonahoro ʙaroi onho gunogun ʙajon mekunem (dar har cize ki namedonistand,) to nasavad, ʙigujand, ki az kase dars giriftai va Mo in ojotro ʙaroi ahli donis ʙajon mekunem, ki onro qaʙul mekunand va pajravi on mesavand. (Va onon kasoneand, ki ʙo Rasuli Alloh sallallohu alajhi va sallam va on ci ʙar u nozil suda imon ovardagonand)
